# Content Performance & ROI Metrics

## 1. Organic Content Metrics

- **Traffic Growth**: Month-over-month organic sessions.
- **Engagement**: Average time on page, bounce rate, and social shares.
- **Authority**: Backlinks earned and domain authority impact.

## 2. Social & Engagement KPIs

- **Sentiment**: Analysis of comments and discussion tone.
- **Conversion**: Click-through rates (CTR) for email and social CTAs.
- **Viral Growth**: Expansion through non-paid referral and resharing.

## 3. Business & Revenue Metrics

- **Attribution**: Conversion rate and lead generation per content piece.
- **Efficiency**: Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC) vs content production cost.
- **Lifetime Value**: ROI tracking of high-performing "evergreen" assets.
